Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory944.jpg'}
{3: 'The biting wind howls through the open hangar gates, its icy chill lingering within the metallic confines of the docking bays.'}
{3: 'The fierce battle from moments ago has left the air heavy with heated tension.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'His moves are fierce but not smooth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Rather than a Construct... he's more like a machine fighting according to a preset behavior pattern.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'That sense of dissonance feels just as unsettling as the contradictions you have witnessed in Aleksei.'}

{3: 'All the nuanced hints you have noticed since entering the city converge together after this confrontation. Behind the rapidly escalating chaos, the unseen force finally puts on a mask, emerging into the spotlight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, that... that mechanical model just now... something feels off about him.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've noticed it, too.", 3: '14', 4: 'Something feels off?', 5: '15'}
{3: '"He" seems to have merely replicated Lee\'s appearance and fundamental attack strategies, yet to those acquainted with Lee, it would be evident that this imitation is merely skin-deep.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes, "he" seems to have merely replicated Lee\'s appearance and fundamental attack strategies, but all the other frame data is entirely different.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's as if... someone just caught a brief glimpse of Hyperreal somewhere—maybe not even from live data capture—and hastily replicated this shell from that limited information."}
{3: 'You find this approach oddly familiar. But... where did they even get a chance to see the Hyperreal frame?'}
{3: "Just as the refugees are settled in and you're about to ask Hanying about updates from the outside, she walks right over."}
{2: 'Hanying, entering this area should require an access key.', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Did you find another way in?', 3: '22'}
{3: 'When you were brought here, the mechanoid entered a long sequence of access codes at the Administrative Hall entrance before the gates would open.'}
{3: 'As much as you hate to question Hanying... if Veronica has persuaded her to collaborate, this location may not be secure either.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's actually what I want to talk to you about... Aleksei gave me the access key.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei?', 3: '27', 4: 'The governor?', 5: '27'}
{3: "The memory of Aleksei's unsettling behavior during the negotiations flashes through your mind. You take a step back, your hand instinctively reaching for the concealed sidearm."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I know what's concerning you, Commandant. To be honest, I'm surprised too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Understanding your concerns, Hanying lowers her eyes and plays footage from the terminal.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory943.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'This is urgent, so please, you have to trust me. I might not stay lucid for long.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'Hangar 3C at the spacecraft docking area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "Please, don't let Veronica make an even graver mistake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '...I cannot fully trust you.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Aleksei', 3: "I'm sorry, but there's no time for more explanations. I'm not sure how long I can stay clear-headed enough to talk. I'll give you the access key to the Administrative Hall—it's clear of any ambush, and I trust you've already scouted the area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Aleksei', 3: 'The key is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory943.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.25'}
{2: '...', 3: '46', 4: "Something's indeed wrong.", 5: '46'}
{3: 'The Aleksei in this recording is completely different from the one you encountered during the previous negotiation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I can\'t be sure, but I get the feeling that the "Aleksei" from before was just a puppet, like someone else was pulling the strings...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just like this crude mechanical model...', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yes, that Aleksei felt very similar to this mechanical model, and...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Whether manipulating Aleksei to stir up trouble or using a fake Lee to sow discord, these actions seem designed to sabotage others' efforts to defuse the situation."}
{3: 'Once you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, no matter how improbable, must be the truth. Besides, there is something oddly familiar about these tactics...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory864.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'But some unforeseen events occurred, like that thing calling itself "the Emperor".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But he seemed to have anticipated everything... as if simulations and predictions were second nature to him.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory944.jpg'}
{2: 'He might have been an experimental subject who escaped from Project Gestalt.', 3: '66'}
{3: 'Could it be... the "experimental subject" called "the Emperor" who appeared in the Tabula Akasha?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You mean... Schulz?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Emperor is Schulz?', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Indeed. He was the mechanoid by my side back in Kowloong. His codename is the Emperor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Ah, my apologies... Due to certain circumstances, I can't tell you any more details about this.", 4: '1'}
{3: "An apologetic smile crosses Hanying's face."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "But if I'm not mistaken, the special code that appeared in Tabula Akasha... was Schulz.", 4: '1'}
{2: "So he didn't self-destruct at the Kowloong headquarters...", 3: '80', 4: 'So it wasn\'t a simple "self-destruction robot"...', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The last I heard, Sage took him away, but... given his expertise in programming, he might have left backup data somewhere.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Rumor has it that... he wasn't just your average awakened machine, though I don't have details on what made him special. Still, it wouldn't surprise me if he was the one manipulating Aleksei.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'But why would he do this?', 3: '82'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Because he hates everyone.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whether or not the Emperor is truly behind this, the proposition that someone is pulling the strings seems to explain all the strange occurrences.'}
{3: 'The way Aleksei stalled during negotiations, misled the resistance, and provoked their attacks...'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'That "Aleksei" is deliberately trying to provoke Veronica.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the only human Veronica truly trusts, Aleksei showing her the brutal wounds from his near-death experience would undoubtedly elicit an intense reaction from her.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Veronica is being deceived... I have to find her.', 4: '1'}
{2: "She won't believe you.", 3: '90'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I have to at least try. We mechanoids do not abandon our own.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She answers with a gentle smile.'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I would've remained in that storage pod forever... if it weren't for my fellow mechanoids, who never gave up trying to wake me. That's the only reason I'm talking to you today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's the same with Veronica... Even if she barely listens to what I say, I won't give up on her as long as there's the slightest chance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "She shouldn't have become fuel for hatred... Someone else is behind these tragedies.", 4: '1'}
{3: "A sharp glint grows in Hanying's eyes."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4601_01.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '"The Emperor" not only turned his back on the Church but nearly brought Kowloong to complete ruin.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Even now, he continues to incite hatred between mechanoids and humans, going so far as to sacrifice the lives of his kin...'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "He deceived his own people, deceived everyone. He... must pay for what he's done."}
{3: "The female mechanoid's gaze pierces through the mist, fixing upon the figure lurking behind the scene."}
{3: 'The determination born from her gentle nature proves sharper than any blade.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Let's start planning our next move."}
{3: 'She turns toward you with a gentle smile.'}
